languages.text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.
languages.original_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

traits.locale_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a Death Cult assassin, she can use a special ability called Raining Blood. When used, it makes a target of the next Kibellah's melee attack explode with a burst of blood which covers the floor and the enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called blood phial to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a Death Cult assassin, she can use a special ability called Raining Blood. When used, it makes a target of the next Kibellah's melee attack explode with a burst of blood which covers the floor and the enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called blood phial to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a Death Cult assassin, she can use a special ability called Raining Blood. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target. The affected enemies suffer additional damage. Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a blood phial to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. traits.locale_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a Death Cult assassin, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blood Phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

languages.text:
El trasfondo de Kibellah es algo singular. Como {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesina del Culto de la Muerte{/g}, puede usar una capacidad especial llamada {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Lluvia de sangre{/g}. Al usarla, hace que el objetivo del siguiente ataque cuerpo a cuerpo de Kibellah explote en una lluvia de sangre que cubre el suelo y a los enemigos que haya detrás de su objetivo.
Los enemigos afectados sufren daño adicional.
Kibellah también puede usar un consumible especial, un {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}frasco de sangre{/g}, para llenar aún más de sangre el campo de batalla.
languages.original_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

traits.locale_text: El trasfondo de Kibellah es algo singular. Como asesina del Culto de la Muerte, puede usar una capacidad especial llamada Lluvia de sangre. Al usarla, hace que el objetivo del siguiente ataque cuerpo a cuerpo de Kibellah explote en una lluvia de sangre que cubre el suelo y a los enemigos que haya detrás de su objetivo. Los enemigos afectados sufren daño adicional. Kibellah también puede usar un consumible especial, un frasco de sangre, para llenar aún más de sangre el campo de batalla.

languages.text:
キベラの経歴は驚異的だ。{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}である彼女は、{g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}血の雨{/g}と呼ばれる特殊アビリティが使用できる。使用すると、キベラの次の近接攻撃のターゲットが血しぶきを上げて爆発し、床とターゲットの後ろにいる敵を覆いつくす。
攻撃を受けた敵には、追加ダメージが付与される。
キベラは{g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}血の小瓶{/g}と呼ばれる特殊な投擲アイテムが使用可能で、戦場にさらに多くの血を撒くことができる。
languages.original_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

traits.locale_text: キベラの経歴は驚異的だ。デスカルト・アサシンとして、彼女は血の雨と呼ばれる特殊アビリティが使用できる。使用すると、キベラの次の近接攻撃のターゲットが血しぶきを上げて爆発し、床とターゲットの後ろにいる敵を覆いつくす。 攻撃を受けた敵は、追加ダメージを受ける。 キベラは血の小瓶と呼ばれる特殊な当的可能なアイテムが使用可能で、戦場にさらに多くの血を撒くことができる。

languages.text:
绮贝菈拥有非同寻常的背景。身为{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}，她拥有{g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}血如雨下{/g}这项特殊能力。使用此能力时，绮贝菈的下次近战攻击会让目标鲜血飞溅，覆盖目标身后的地面与敌人。
受此能力影响的敌人会受到额外伤害。
此外，绮贝菈还可以使用一种特殊的可投掷消耗品，叫做{g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}”鲜血安瓿”{/g}，从而在战场上洒下更多血迹。
languages.original_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

traits.locale_text: 绮贝菈拥有非同寻常的背景。身为拜死教刺客，她拥有血如雨下这项特殊能力。使用此能力时，绮贝菈的下次近战攻击会让目标鲜血飞溅，覆盖目标身后的地面与敌人。 受此能力影响的敌人会受到额外伤害。 此外，绮贝菈还可以使用一种特殊的可投掷消耗品，叫做“鲜血安瓿”，从而在战场上洒下更多血迹。

languages.text:
Kibellah hat eine bemerkenswerte Vergangenheit. Als {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassinin{/g} verfügt sie über eine Spezialfähigkeit namens {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Blutregen{/g}. Setzt sie diese ein, explodiert das Ziel von Kibellahs nächstem Nahkampfangriff in einer Fontäne aus Blut, das den Boden und Gegner hinter dem Ziel bedeckt.
Die betroffenen Gegner erleiden zusätzlichen Schaden.
Kibellah kann außerdem einen speziellen Verbrauchsgegenstand namens "{g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blutphiole{/g}" werfen, um noch mehr Blut auf dem Schlachtfeld zu vergießen.
languages.original_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

traits.locale_text: Kibellah hat eine bemerkenswerte Vergangenheit. Als Todeskult-Assassinin verfügt sie über eine Spezialfähigkeit namens Blutregen. Setzt sie diese ein, explodiert das Ziel von Kibellahs nächstem Nahkampfangriff in einer Fontäne aus Blut, das den Boden und Gegner hinter dem Ziel bedeckt. Die betroffenen Gegner erleiden zusätzlichen Schaden. Kibellah kann außerdem einen speziellen Verbrauchsgegenstand namens "Blutphiole" werfen, um noch mehr Blut auf dem Schlachtfeld zu vergießen.

languages.text:
L'histoire de Kibellah est particulièrement remarquable. En sa qualité d'{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g}, elle dispose d'une capacité spéciale appelée {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Pluie de sang{/g}. Lorsqu'elle l'utilise, sa prochaine attaque de mêlée fait exploser sa cible dans une gerbe de sang qui vient éclabousser le sol et tous les ennemis situés derrière.
Les ennemis affectés subissent des dégâts supplémentaires.
Pour répandre encore plus de sang sur le champ de bataille, Kibellah peut également lancer un consommable spécial appelé {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Fiole de sang{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

traits.locale_text: L'histoire de Kibellah est particulièrement remarquable. En sa qualité d'assassin du culte de la mort, elle dispose d'une capacité spéciale appelée Pluie de sang. Lorsqu'elle l'utilise, sa prochaine attaque de mêlée fait exploser sa cible dans une gerbe de sang qui vient éclabousser le sol et tous les ennemis situés derrière. Les ennemis affectés subissent des dégâts supplémentaires. Pour répandre encore plus de sang sur le champ de bataille, Kibellah peut également lancer un consommable spécial appelé Fiole de sang.

languages.text:
Происхождение Кибеллы заслуживает особого внимания. Ей, как {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}ассасину культа смерти{/g}, доступна особая способность {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Кровавый дождь{/g}. После ее применения из цели следующей атаки Кибеллы в ближнем бою вырывается струя крови, забрызгивая пол и противников позади этой цели.
Враги, на которых попала кровь, получают дополнительный урон.
Также у Кибеллы есть особый расходный предмет – {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавый фиал{/g}. Она может метнуть его, чтобы пролить на поле боя еще больше крови.
languages.original_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.

traits.locale_text: Происхождение Кибеллы заслуживает особого внимания. Ей, как ассасину культа смерти, доступна особая способность Кровавый дождь. После ее применения из цели следующей атаки Кибеллы в ближнем бою вырывается фонтан крови, забрызгивая пол и противников позади этой цели. Враги, на которых попала кровь, получают дополнительный урон. Также у Кибеллы есть особый расходный предмет – кровавый фиал. Она может метнуть его, чтобы пролить на поле боя еще больше крови.

Происхождение Кибеллы заслуживает особого внимания. Ей, как ассасину культа смерти, доступна особая способность Кровавый дождь. После ее применения из цели следующей атаки Кибеллы в ближнем бою вырывается фонтан крови, забрызгивая пол и противников позади этой цели. Враги, на которых попала кровь, получают дополнительный урон. Также у Кибеллы есть особый расходный предмет – кровавый фиал. Она может метнуть его, чтобы пролить на поле боя еще больше крови.

languages.text:
Kibellah, dikkate şayan bir geçmişe sahiptir. {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Ölüm Tarikatı suikastçısı{/g} olarak {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Yağan Kan{/g} adı verilen özel bir kabiliyeti kullanabilir. Bu kabiliyet, Kibellah'nın bir sonraki yakın dövüş saldırısının hedefinin patlamasına ve hem zeminin hem de hedefin arkasındaki düşmanların kanla kaplanmasına yol açar.
Etkilenen düşmanlar, ilave hasara maruz kalırlar.
Ayrıca Kibellah, {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}kan tüpü{/g} adı verilen fırlatılabilir özel bir sarf eşyayı kullanabilir. Bu sayede çatışma alanında daha da fazla kan dökebilir.
languages.original_text:
Kibellah has a remarkable background. As a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, she can use a special ability called {g|f:6d4c042a5a71482d87c6087fb0a3a245}Raining Blood{/g}. When used, it causes the target of Kibellah's next melee attack to explode in a burst of blood, covering the floor and any enemies behind the target.
The affected enemies suffer additional damage.
Kibellah can also use a special throwable consumable item called a {g|ib:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} to spill even more blood on the battlefield.
